intro.line: This is gonna feel real good, a'ight?
Everybody please put a thumb in the air Hey, hey

chorus.line: One, two, three, four
Some crazy-ass kids gonna knock up on your door, so
Let 'em in, let 'em in, let 'em in Hey
One, two, three, four
Some crazy-ass kids gonna knock up on your door, so
Let 'em in, let 'em in, let 'em in Hey

verse.line: I feel like a million bucks

topic.line: But my money don't really feel like I do

verse.line: And from the ground, I built my own damn buzz
People was amazed I was still in high school

topic.line: But now I'm out, and money what I'm 'bout
Tryna get so much that I can't keep count

verse.line: New kicks give me cushion like whoopie
Keep a smile like an Eat'n Park cookie
Everything good, I'm white boy awesome
Up all night, Johnny Carson

topic.line: I ain't got a Benz, no, just a Honda
But tryna get my money like an Anaconda

verse.line: Real, real long, cross the country

topic.line: Smoke joints in the whip, no cop can bust me

verse.line: Drive into the stage, they applaud and scream
All them pretty little girls come and flock with me
Yeah, I rock the beat

chorus.line: One, two, three, four
Some crazy-ass kids gonna knock up on your door, so
Let 'em in, let 'em in, let 'em in Hey
One, two, three, four
Some crazy-ass kids gonna knock up on your door, so
Let 'em in, let 'em in, let 'em in Hey

topic.line: And I like my rhymes witty, all my dimes pretty
If you got weed, you can come fly with me

verse.line: I don't take pity on them silly little hoes
Milli Vanilli but this is really how it goes
Mouth my words, don't say shit
Shh, shut up, bitch, and ride this dick
I'm just playing, let's have a ball

topic.line: All we need is some weed, hoes and alcohol, hey

verse.line: Don't forget it when I'm wreckin' the etiquette for the hell of it
Smellin' it when the L is lit, I'm flyer than a pelican
Young fresh, but I'm so damn intelligent
Girls givin' brains 'cause I'm acting like a gentleman
In deeper than the water Michael Phelps was in
Finna have a party, baby, you can tell your friends
We the type, lookin' right, still settin' trends

topic.line: Fuck a job, I'ma get these dead presidents

Let 'em in, let 'em in, let 'em in Hey
One, two, three, four
Some crazy-ass kids gonna knock up on your door, so
Let 'em in, let 'em in, let 'em in Hey

topic.line: Not a day, goes by when I ain't gettin' high

bridge.line: They wonder why don't I go get myself a job

topic.line: So I can make, them bucks, but I don't give a fuck
